short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A bot from shortfuts! Simply set up your filter, click start, and watch the coins roll in as the bot buys cards on your behalf!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to automate the EA web app and snipe cards for you when you're not around.
